title: Domino's gaining share from local rivals, says CEO Russell Weiner
description: "A large, fragmented category offers significant growth opportunity," Russell said in a presentation during the company's Global Investor Day on Thursday.  Acknowledging the rise of regional rivals across all its markets worldwide, Domino's noted in its presentation, "We will get more customers through a value strategy."  In India as well as globally, Domino's has been introducing more value meals and increasing consumer promotions as strategies to fend off emerging regional pizza brands.
